Name: Shopping Clutter 2: Christmas Square
About the game: The Walkers—the animal family of travellers well-known to all the fans of “Travel Mosaic” series—are preparing Animalville for Christmas. The whole family decided to create a Christmas square where children and adults can have fun—where they can enter the spirit of Christmas and maybe even believe in miracles again. But it turned out to be not as easy as the Walkers thought, so they have to do a lot and clean up the store shelves’ clutter to find all the necessary equipment. Would you like to be one of Santa Claus’s elves for a while and help out? Then, join the Walkers! “Shopping Clutter 2: Christmas Square” is an amazing, colorful brain-jogging game for players of all ages with festive images, animation and music for entering the spirit of Christmas. Festive images, items, animation and music for entering the spirit of Christmas New level modes 140 “clutter” puzzles and 20 additional puzzles Favorite characters and funny dialogues Colorful graphics and real challenges for all the fans of puzzles Christmas tree, Santa Claus, elves and much more
